guardian.title: Record New York City murder freeze hits 12 days as experts cite extreme cold
guardian.topComment: It is just too dang cold to murderate anyone.

guardian.title: Netanyahu trip to Congress provokes harsh reaction from US Jewish leaders
guardian.topComment: It is unfortunate that US foreign policy is continually held hostage by the hard right of the pro-israel lobby. The problem is campaign financing and the influence of money in American politics. The Israel lobby has large amounts of funds and organiz...

guardian.title: Canadian man and American woman charged over foiled mass shooting plot
guardian.topComment: Of course it couldn't have been a terrorist attack if they aren't Muslims. Perish the thought.

guardian.title: In aftermath of Chapel Hill shootings, a community searches for answers
guardian.topComment: Meaningless also if we are to believe its root words, “Islam” and “phobia,” have any bearing on its meaning: The people who are general identified as “Islamophobes” are some of the last people left alive on the planet who dare criticize radical Islam...
